pull.title: wallet: Replace "non-0" with "non-zero" in translatable error message
pull.body: Transifex interprets the "-0" substring as a number in translatable strings. Since not all translations preserve "-0," this triggers a corresponding warning. While this warning could be disabled globally, it is more reasonable to adjust the original string instead.

verification.payload:
tree e66173d00f75000e6a6b968749b9ff0b08d4b73f
parent 15717f0ef3960969ee550a4a41741987b86684dc
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1741105783 +0000
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1741105783 +0000

wallet: Replace "non-0" with "non-zero" in translatable error message

Transifex interprets the "-0" substring as a number in translatable
strings. Since not all translations preserve "-0," this triggers a
corresponding warning. While this warning could be disabled globally, it
is more reasonable to adjust the original string instead.

Transifex interprets the "-0" substring as a number in translatable
strings. Since not all translations preserve "-0," this triggers a
corresponding warning. While this warning could be disabled globally, it
is more reasonable to adjust the original string instead.

### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| ACK | [davidgumberg](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/31987#issuecomment-2698490041), [1440000bytes](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/31987#pullrequestreview-2658842421), [l0rinc](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/31987#issuecomment-2701061871), [BrandonOdiwuor](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/31987#pullrequestreview-2667196940), [laanwj](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/31987#pullrequestreview-2671328596) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with 👎 to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.

Concept ACK

> Since not all translations preserve "-0," this triggers a corresponding warning

How complicated would it be to align the other translations instead?

> Concept ACK
> 
> > Since not all translations preserve "-0," this triggers a corresponding warning
> 
> How complicated would it be to align the other translations instead?

It depends on the language. I cannot say about all of them.

ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/31987/commits/18e83534ace7aa2d26bc7dfa521b1d591b66edfa

Apart from the translation issue, non-0 looks incorrect for an error message. I have seen 'non-zero' or 'nonzero' or 'non zero' in english but never 'non-0'.

> Automatically generated by extract_strings_qt

Yes, but it's committed, so shouldn't we update or regenerate it now?

> > Automatically generated by extract_strings_qt
> 
> Yes, but it's committed, so shouldn't we update or regenerate it now?

Sure. It will be regenerated during the [release process](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/release-process.md#before-branch-off), but not for 29.0 as we are behind the string freeze.

ACK 18e83534ace7aa2d26bc7dfa521b1d591b66edfa

While I would prefer changing the extracted strings here, it's not very important.

Code review ACK 18e83534ace7aa2d26bc7dfa521b1d591b66edfa
Aside from the issue raised, this makes the message more readable.
